framework.name: NIST 800-53 Rev 5
framework.description: Security and Privacy Controls for Information Systems and Organisations. NIST Special Publication 800-53 provides a catalogue of security and privacy controls for all US federal information systems.

controls.name: Account Management
controls.description: Manage system accounts, group memberships, privileges, credentials, and access authorisations.

cloud_context.detection_guidance: Monitor IAM user/role creation, modification, and deletion events in CloudTrail or Cloud Audit Logs.

controls.name: Automated Account Management
controls.description: Support the management of system accounts using automated mechanisms.

cloud_context.detection_guidance: Automate account lifecycle management and monitor for manual overrides.

controls.name: Automated Audit Actions
controls.description: Automatically audit account creation, modification, enabling, disabling, and removal actions.

cloud_context.detection_guidance: Configure CloudTrail/Cloud Audit Logs to capture all IAM events with alerting on critical changes.

controls.name: Access Enforcement
controls.description: Enforce approved authorisations for logical access to information and system resources.

cloud_context.detection_guidance: Monitor access denied events and policy evaluation failures.

controls.name: Information Flow Enforcement
controls.description: Enforce approved authorisations for controlling the flow of information within the system and between systems.

cloud_context.detection_guidance: Monitor VPC Flow Logs and firewall rule changes for unexpected traffic patterns.

controls.name: Separation of Duties
controls.description: Separate duties of individuals to reduce risk of malevolent activity.

cloud_context.detection_guidance: Monitor for single identities with excessive permissions spanning multiple roles.

controls.name: Least Privilege
controls.description: Employ the principle of least privilege, allowing only authorised accesses for users necessary to accomplish assigned tasks.

cloud_context.detection_guidance: Use IAM Access Analyzer or IAM Recommender to identify over-privileged accounts.

controls.name: Authorise Access to Security Functions
controls.description: Explicitly authorise access to security-relevant information and system functions.

cloud_context.detection_guidance: Monitor access to security services (GuardDuty, Security Hub, CloudTrail).

controls.name: Privileged Accounts
controls.description: Restrict privileged accounts on the system to personnel or roles specifically designated.

cloud_context.detection_guidance: Monitor root/admin account usage and privileged role assumptions.

controls.name: Log Use of Privileged Functions
controls.description: Log the execution of privileged functions.

cloud_context.detection_guidance: Enable CloudTrail management events and data events for sensitive resources.

controls.name: Unsuccessful Logon Attempts
controls.description: Enforce a limit of consecutive invalid logon attempts by a user and take action when the maximum is exceeded.

cloud_context.detection_guidance: Monitor for repeated failed authentication attempts in CloudTrail or identity logs.

controls.name: Remote Access
controls.description: Establish usage restrictions and implementation guidance for each type of remote access allowed.

cloud_context.detection_guidance: Monitor Session Manager sessions and VPN connections for unusual patterns.

controls.name: Event Logging
controls.description: Identify the types of events that the system is capable of logging in support of the audit function.

cloud_context.detection_guidance: Ensure all management and data plane events are logged and retained.

controls.name: Content of Audit Records
controls.description: Ensure that audit records contain information that establishes what occurred, when, where, the source, and the outcome.

cloud_context.detection_guidance: CloudTrail and Cloud Audit Logs automatically capture required metadata.

controls.name: Audit Record Review, Analysis, and Reporting
controls.description: Review and analyse system audit records for indications of inappropriate or unusual activity.

cloud_context.detection_guidance: Use CloudWatch Logs Insights or Chronicle to query and analyse audit logs.

controls.name: Automated Process Integration
controls.description: Integrate audit record review, analysis, and reporting with automated mechanisms.

cloud_context.detection_guidance: Configure Security Hub or SCC with automated alerting on critical findings.

controls.name: Protection of Audit Information
controls.description: Protect audit information and audit logging tools from unauthorised access, modification, and deletion.

cloud_context.detection_guidance: Enable CloudTrail log file validation and S3 Object Lock for immutable storage.

controls.name: Audit Record Generation
controls.description: Provide audit record generation capability for the event types the system is capable of auditing.

cloud_context.detection_guidance: Ensure CloudTrail is enabled in all regions with multi-region trail.

controls.name: Baseline Configuration
controls.description: Develop, document, and maintain a current baseline configuration of the system.

cloud_context.detection_guidance: Use AWS Config or Cloud Asset Inventory to track configuration drift.

controls.name: Configuration Change Control
controls.description: Determine and document the types of changes to the system that are configuration-controlled.

cloud_context.detection_guidance: Monitor for configuration changes outside approved change windows.

controls.name: Configuration Settings
controls.description: Establish and document configuration settings for components within the system.

cloud_context.detection_guidance: Use AWS Config conformance packs or SCC for configuration compliance.

controls.name: Least Functionality
controls.description: Configure the system to provide only essential capabilities and prohibit or restrict use of non-essential functions.

cloud_context.detection_guidance: Monitor for services or ports enabled beyond baseline requirements.

controls.name: System Component Inventory
controls.description: Develop and document an inventory of system components that accurately reflects the system.

cloud_context.detection_guidance: Use AWS Config or Cloud Asset Inventory for continuous inventory.

controls.name: Identification and Authentication (Organisational Users)
controls.description: Uniquely identify and authenticate organisational users and associate that unique identification with processes acting on behalf of those users.

cloud_context.detection_guidance: Monitor authentication events and identity provider integrations.

controls.name: Multi-Factor Authentication to Privileged Accounts
controls.description: Implement multi-factor authentication for access to privileged accounts.

cloud_context.detection_guidance: Monitor for console logins without MFA, especially for privileged accounts.

controls.name: Multi-Factor Authentication to Non-Privileged Accounts
controls.description: Implement multi-factor authentication for access to non-privileged accounts.

cloud_context.detection_guidance: Enforce MFA for all user accounts via IAM policies or identity provider.

controls.name: Identifier Management
controls.description: Manage system identifiers for users and devices by receiving authorisation and assigning unique identifiers.

cloud_context.detection_guidance: Monitor for duplicate or unauthorized user/service account creation.

controls.name: Authenticator Management
controls.description: Manage system authenticators by verifying the identity of the individual receiving the authenticator.

cloud_context.detection_guidance: Monitor access key age, password policy compliance, and credential rotation.

controls.name: Password-Based Authentication
controls.description: For password-based authentication, enforce minimum password complexity and change requirements.

cloud_context.detection_guidance: Use AWS Config or Security Hub to monitor password policy compliance.

controls.name: Identification and Authentication (Non-Organisational Users)
controls.description: Uniquely identify and authenticate non-organisational users or processes acting on behalf of non-organisational users.

cloud_context.detection_guidance: Monitor external identity federation and API authentication events.

controls.name: Incident Handling
controls.description: Implement an incident handling capability that includes preparation, detection, analysis, containment, eradication, and recovery.

cloud_context.detection_guidance: Use Security Hub or SCC to centralise incident detection and response.

controls.name: Incident Monitoring
controls.description: Track and document system security and privacy incidents.

cloud_context.detection_guidance: Aggregate findings in Security Hub or SCC for centralised monitoring.

controls.name: Physical Access Authorisations
controls.description: Develop, approve, and maintain a list of individuals with authorised access to the facility.

cloud_context.detection_guidance: Physical data centre security is managed by AWS/GCP. Review provider SOC 2 and ISO 27001 certifications.

controls.name: Physical Access Control
controls.description: Enforce physical access authorisations at entry and exit points to the facility.

cloud_context.detection_guidance: Physical access controls are managed by AWS/GCP. Review provider compliance certifications.

controls.name: Personnel Screening
controls.description: Screen individuals prior to authorising access to the system.

cloud_context.detection_guidance: Personnel screening is an organisational process. Not detectable via cloud APIs.

controls.name: Vulnerability Monitoring and Scanning
controls.description: Monitor and scan for vulnerabilities in the system and hosted applications.

cloud_context.detection_guidance: Enable Amazon Inspector or SCC vulnerability scanning for continuous assessment.

controls.name: Continuous Monitoring
controls.description: Develop a system-level continuous monitoring strategy and implement continuous monitoring.

cloud_context.detection_guidance: Enable Security Hub with all available integrations for continuous monitoring.

controls.name: Information in Shared System Resources
controls.description: Prevent unauthorised and unintended information transfer via shared system resources.

cloud_context.detection_guidance: Monitor for cross-account or cross-project resource sharing.

controls.name: Boundary Protection
controls.description: Monitor and control communications at the external managed interfaces to the system and at key internal managed interfaces.

cloud_context.detection_guidance: Enable VPC Flow Logs and monitor for unexpected inbound/outbound traffic.

controls.name: External Telecommunications Services
controls.description: Implement a managed interface for each external telecommunications service.

cloud_context.detection_guidance: Monitor Direct Connect or Cloud Interconnect for unusual traffic patterns.

controls.name: Deny by Default / Allow by Exception
controls.description: Deny network communications traffic by default and allow by exception.

cloud_context.detection_guidance: Ensure security groups deny all inbound by default with explicit allow rules.

controls.name: Transmission Confidentiality and Integrity
controls.description: Protect the confidentiality and integrity of transmitted information.

cloud_context.detection_guidance: Monitor for unencrypted connections and certificate expiration.

controls.name: Cryptographic Key Establishment and Management
controls.description: Establish and manage cryptographic keys when cryptography is employed within the system.

cloud_context.detection_guidance: Monitor KMS key usage, rotation, and access patterns.

controls.name: Session Authenticity
controls.description: Protect the authenticity of communications sessions.

cloud_context.detection_guidance: Enforce TLS and monitor for session hijacking attempts.

controls.name: Malicious Code Protection
controls.description: Implement malicious code protection mechanisms at system entry and exit points to detect and eradicate malicious code.

cloud_context.detection_guidance: Enable GuardDuty Malware Protection for EBS scanning.

controls.name: System Monitoring
controls.description: Monitor the system to detect attacks, indicators of potential attacks, and unauthorised connections.

cloud_context.detection_guidance: Enable GuardDuty and Security Hub for comprehensive threat detection.

controls.name: Automated Tools and Mechanisms for Real-Time Analysis
controls.description: Employ automated tools and mechanisms to support near real-time analysis of events.

cloud_context.detection_guidance: GuardDuty and SCC provide automated real-time threat detection.

controls.name: Inbound and Outbound Communications Traffic
controls.description: Monitor inbound and outbound communications traffic for unusual or unauthorised activities.

cloud_context.detection_guidance: Enable VPC Flow Logs and use GuardDuty for traffic analysis.

controls.name: System-Generated Alerts
controls.description: Alert personnel when system-generated indicators of compromise or potential compromise occur.

cloud_context.detection_guidance: Configure Security Hub or SCC with notification integrations.

controls.name: Security Alerts, Advisories, and Directives
controls.description: Receive system security alerts, advisories, and directives from external organisations on an ongoing basis.

cloud_context.detection_guidance: Subscribe to AWS Security Bulletins and GCP Security Advisories.

controls.name: Software, Firmware, and Information Integrity
controls.description: Employ integrity verification tools to detect unauthorised changes to software, firmware, and information.

cloud_context.detection_guidance: Enable CloudTrail log file validation and container image signing.

controls.name: Information Input Validation
controls.description: Check the validity of information inputs.

cloud_context.detection_guidance: Use WAF or Cloud Armor with managed rule sets for input validation.
